scripts.build: npm run install:all && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run copy:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ..
scripts.copy:frontend: mkdir -p backend/dist/public && cp -r frontend/dist/* backend/dist/public/ 2>/dev/null || (mkdir backend\dist\public 2>nul & xcopy frontend\dist\* backend\dist\public\ /E /I /Y)
